mapper.sql:
SELECT a.REC_ID as "recId", a.CHECK_NO as "checkNo", a.SEND_VERIFY_NO as "sendVerifyNo", a.INSTRM_PLAN_NO as "instrmPlanNo", a.PLAN_DETAIL_REC_ID as "planDetailRecId", a.VERIFY_DEPT as "verifyDept", a.VERIFY_NOTE as "verifyNote", a.WORK_FLOW_INST_ID as "workFlowInstId", a.WORK_FLOW_INST_STATUS as "workFlowInstStatus", a.DOC_ID as "docId", a.COMPANY_CODE as "companyCode", a.COMPANY_NAME as "companyName", a.REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", a.REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", a.REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", a.REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", a.REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", a.REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", a.DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", a.ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", a.REC_STATUS as "recStatus", a.EXT1 as "ext1", a.EXT2 as "ext2", a.EXT3 as "ext3", a.EXT4 as "ext4", a.EXT5 as "ext5", a.EDIT_DEPT_CODE as "editDeptCode", b.SEND_CONSIGNER_NAME as "sendConsignerName", b.SEND_CONSIGNER_TELE as "sendConsignerTele", b.SEND_RECEIVER_NAME as "sendReceiverName", b.SEND_RECEIVER_TELE as "sendReceiverTele", b.SEND_VERIFY_STATUS as "sendVerifyStatus", b.BACK_RETURN_NAME as "backReturnName", b.BACK_RETURN_TELE as "backReturnTele", b.BACK_CONSIGNER_TELE as "backConsignerTele", b.BACK_RECEIVER_NAME as "backReceiverName", b.SEND_VERIFY_DATE as "sendVerifyDate", b.VERIFY_BACK_DATE as "verifyBackDate"
FROM T_MEA_SUBMISSION_RECORD a LEFT JOIN T_MEA_SUBMISSION b ON a.SEND_VERIFY_NO=b.SEND_VERIFY_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MEA_SUBMISSION_RECORD ( REC_ID, CHECK_NO, SEND_VERIFY_NO, INSTRM_PLAN_NO, PLAN_DETAIL_REC_ID, VERIFY_DEPT, VERIFY_NOTE, WORK_FLOW_INST_ID, WORK_FLOW_INST_STATUS, COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, REC_STATUS, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5, EDIT_DEPT_CODE) VALUES ( #{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendVerifyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instrmPlanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planDetailRecId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workFlowInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workFlowInstStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recRevisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recReviseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', #{archiveFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_MEA_SUBMISSION_RECORD SET
SEND_VERIFY_NO=#{sendVerifyNo},
CHECK_NO=#{checkNo},
INSTRM_PLAN_NO=#{instrmPlanNo},
PLAN_DETAIL_REC_ID=#{planDetailRecId},
VERIFY_DEPT=#{verifyDept},
VERIFY_NOTE=#{verifyNote},
WORK_FLOW_INST_ID=#{workFlowInstId},
WORK_FLOW_INST_STATUS=#{workFlowInstStatus},
DOC_ID=#{docId},
COMPANY_CODE=#{companyCode},
COMPANY_NAME=#{companyName},
ARCHIVE_FLAG=#{archiveFlag},
REC_STATUS=#{recStatus},
EXT1=#{ext1},
EXT2=#{ext2},
EXT3=#{ext3},
EXT4=#{ext4},
EXT5=#{ext5},
EDIT_DEPT_CODE=#{editDeptCode},
REC_REVISOR=#{recRevisor}, REC_REVISE_TIME=#{recReviseTime} WHERE REC_ID=#{recId}
mapper.sql: SELECT a.REC_ID as "recId", a.TEST_REC_ID as "testRecId", a.TEST_LIST_DETAIL_REC_ID as "testListDetailRecId", a.SEND_VERIFY_NO as "sendVerifyNo", a.EQUIP_CODE as "equipCode", a.EQUIP_NAME as "equipName", a.MAT_SPECIFI as "matSpecifi", a.MANUFACTURE_NO as "manufactureNo", a.MANUFACTURE as "manufacture", a.INSTALLATION_UNIT as "installationUnit", a.MEASURE_BARCODE as "measureBarcode", a.VERIFY_DATE as "verifyDate", a.VERIFY_DEPT as "verifyDept", a.VERIFICATION_NO as "verificationNo", a.VERIFICATION_TYPE as "verificationType", a.VERIFY_PROOF as "verifyProof", a.VERIFY_REPORT_NO as "verifyReportNo", a.VERIFY_REPORT_TYPE as "verifyReportType", a.VERIFY_REPORT_NAME as "verifyReportName", a.VERIFY_REPORT_DATE as "verifyReportDate", a.VERIFY_FEE as "verifyFee", a.VERIFY_RESULT as "verifyResult", a.VERIFY_CONCLUSION as "verifyConclusion", a.VERIFY_REPORT_FILEID as "verifyReportFileid", a.LAST_VERIFY_DATE as "lastVerifyDate", a.NEXT_VERIFY_DATE as "nextVerifyDate", a.POSITION1_CODE as "position1Code", a.POSITION1_NAME as "position1Name", a.POSITION2_CODE as "position2Code", a.POSITION2_NAME as "position2Name", a.POSITION3 as "position3", a.POSITION_REMARK as "positionRemark", a.FAULT_NO as "faultNo", a.VERIFY_NOTE as "verifyNote", a.COMPANY_CODE as "companyCode", a.COMPANY_NAME as "companyName", a.REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", a.REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", a.REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", a.REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", a.REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", a.REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", a.DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", a.ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", a.REC_STATUS as "recStatus", a.EXT1 as "ext1", a.EXT2 as "ext2", a.EXT3 as "ext3", a.EXT4 as "ext4", a.EXT5 as "ext5", c.VERIFY_PERIOD as "verifyPeriod", d.USE_DEPT_CNAME as "useDeptCname", d.PLAN_STATUS as "planStatus" FROM T_SUBMISSION_RECORD_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN T_MEA_SUBMISSION_RECORD b ON a.TEST_REC_ID=b.REC_ID LEFT JOIN T_MEA_SUBMISSION_DETAIL c ON a.TEST_LIST_DETAIL_REC_ID=c.REC_ID LEFT JOIN T_MEA_CHECK_PLAN d ON b.INSTRM_PLAN_NO=d.INSTRM_PLAN_NO
mapper.select: WHERE 1=1 AND a.TEST_REC_ID=#{testRecId} order by a.REC_CREATE_TIME desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SUBMISSION_RECORD_DETAIL ( REC_ID, TEST_REC_ID, TEST_LIST_DETAIL_REC_ID, SEND_VERIFY_NO, EQUIP_CODE, EQUIP_NAME, MAT_SPECIFI, MANUFACTURE_NO, MANUFACTURE, INSTALLATION_UNIT, MEASURE_BARCODE, VERIFY_DATE, VERIFY_DEPT, VERIFICATION_NO, VERIFICATION_TYPE, VERIFY_PROOF, VERIFY_REPORT_NO, VERIFY_REPORT_TYPE, VERIFY_REPORT_NAME, VERIFY_REPORT_DATE, VERIFY_FEE, VERIFY_RESULT, VERIFY_CONCLUSION, VERIFY_REPORT_FILEID, LAST_VERIFY_DATE, NEXT_VERIFY_DATE, POSITION1_CODE, POSITION1_NAME, POSITION2_CODE, POSITION2_NAME, POSITION3, POSITION_REMARK, FAULT_NO, VERIFY_NOTE, COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, REC_STATUS, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5 ) VALUES ( #{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testRecId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testListDetailRecId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendVerifyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matSpecifi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufactureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installationUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measureBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verificationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyProof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyReportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyReportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyReportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyReportDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{verifyResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyReportFileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastVerifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextVerifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position1Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position2Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faultNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recRevisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recReviseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archiveFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_SUBMISSION_RECORD_DETAIL SET
TEST_REC_ID=#{testRecId},
TEST_LIST_DETAIL_REC_ID=#{testListDetailRecId},
SEND_VERIFY_NO=#{sendVerifyNo},
EQUIP_CODE=#{equipCode},
EQUIP_NAME=#{equipName},
MAT_SPECIFI=#{matSpecifi},
MANUFACTURE_NO=#{manufactureNo},
MANUFACTURE=#{manufacture},
INSTALLATION_UNIT=#{installationUnit},
MEASURE_BARCODE=#{measureBarcode},
VERIFY_DATE=#{verifyDate},
VERIFY_DEPT=#{verifyDept},
VERIFICATION_NO=#{verificationNo},
VERIFICATION_TYPE=#{verificationType},
VERIFY_PROOF=#{verifyProof},
VERIFY_REPORT_NO=#{verifyReportNo},
VERIFY_REPORT_TYPE=#{verifyReportType},
VERIFY_REPORT_NAME=#{verifyReportName},
VERIFY_REPORT_DATE=#{verifyReportDate},
VERIFY_FEE=#{verifyFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
VERIFY_RESULT=#{verifyResult},
VERIFY_CONCLUSION=#{verifyConclusion},
VERIFY_REPORT_FILEID=#{verifyReportFileid},
LAST_VERIFY_DATE=#{lastVerifyDate},
NEXT_VERIFY_DATE=#{nextVerifyDate},
POSITION1_CODE=#{position1Code},
POSITION1_NAME=#{position1Name},
POSITION2_CODE=#{position2Code},
POSITION2_NAME=#{position2Name},
POSITION3=#{position3},
POSITION_REMARK=#{positionRemark},
FAULT_NO=#{faultNo},
VERIFY_NOTE=#{verifyNote},
COMPANY_CODE=#{companyCode},
COMPANY_NAME=#{companyName},
ARCHIVE_FLAG=#{archiveFlag},
REC_STATUS=#{recStatus},
EXT1=#{ext1},
EXT2=#{ext2},
EXT3=#{ext3},
EXT4=#{ext4},
EXT5=#{ext5},
REC_REVISOR=#{recRevisor}, REC_REVISE_TIME=#{recReviseTime} WHERE REC_ID=#{recId}
mapper.select: WHERE 1=1 AND a.TEST_REC_ID=#{testRecId} order by a.REC_CREATE_TIME desc
